title: Bloomberg Markets: Mineral Rights Gushing Cash for Colleges
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Mineral Rights Gushing Cash for Colleges
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Guy L Patton President/CEO University of Oklahoma Foundation Inc/The Discussing how a mineral rights donation to the school is benefiting endowments. Bloomberg News Higher Education reporter Janet Lorin also participates in the discussion.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
